English: lit. to cling to the high, connect to the rich (idiom); to try to attach oneself to the rich and powerful

d.f: `攀附~`結交~`權貴~。《`儒林外史~．`第一~`七~`回~》：「`總要~`窮人~`家的~`兒女~，`萬~`不可~`貪圖~`富貴~，`攀高結貴~。」`也~`作~「`攀高接貴~」、「`接貴攀高~」。

English: lit. to cling to the high, connect to the rich (idiom); to try to attach oneself to the rich and powerful
